title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte hails 'fantasy footballer' Cesc Fabregas for his impact in Blues' title chase
text:
Sport Chelsea boss Antonio Conte hails 'fantasy footballer' Cesc Fabregas for his impact in Blues' title chase The World Cup winner, 29, has still managed to shine this season despite facing “a new situation” and having to get used to a reduced role Share Conte has hailed Fabregas' impact (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Share Get     
Antonio Conte has hailed “fantasy” footballer Cesc Fabregas. 
Chelsea boss Conte praised midfielder Fabregas for making a big impact in little time during the Blues’ title bid. 
The World Cup winner, 29, has still managed to shine this season despite facing “a new situation” and having to get used to a reduced role rather than being a regular starter. 
Data courtesy of EA SPORTS highlights that Fabregas is proving more than a match for his Premier League rivals having played much less than all of them and is topping the minutes per assist, passes completed per 90 minutes and minutes per chance created tables. 
Even as an 81st minute sub in Monday’s FA Cup tie, Fabregas completed more passes than any Manchester United player in his brief run-out. Conte has steered Chelsea towards another Premier League title (Photo: Getty) Fabregas has had to get used to a reduced role (Photo: Chelsea FC) 
Conte said: “He has always had a great impact, whether he starts a game or comes on. He always has a great impact because he is technically very good, and can put the ball where he wants. 
“He’s a great player. Often he’s decisive with the pass, with the assist, and also to score a goal. 
“For sure, Cesc gives you great quality, great fantasy and assists. 
“Cesc, this season, is showing to be a great professional but, above all, a great player. I’m very pleased to see that in him, his commitment and work-rate. This season he faced a new situation. 
“Cesc, in the past, has always played every single game. It’s not easy to change. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
